overview: Radio D.J. runs a big audience program, targeted at lower income people, in which he comments on the most important facts of the week. He gets enormous success when he narrates the "true" story of Little Red Riding Hood, in three different sexy versions.
tagline: Radio D.J. runs a big audience program, targeted at lower income people, in which he comments on the most important facts of the week. He gets enormous success when he narrates the "true" story of Little Red Riding Hood, in three different sexy versions.
title: Bonitas e Gostosas
